# dive-badge

A versatile badge component for indicating status, categories, or notifications with multiple visual styles and automatic theme support.

## Usage

```html
<dive-badge type="primary" text="New"></dive-badge>
<dive-badge type="success" text="Completed"></dive-badge>
<dive-badge type="warning" text="Pending"></dive-badge>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                                                                 | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `text`   | `text`    |             | `string`                                                             | `''`     |
| `type`   | `type`    |             | `"base" \| "error" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'base'` |
